short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a to do list - add and remove items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your to do list - add and remove items. 
List items remain saved when: 
- Closing and re-opening the To Do List extension tab
- Switching tabs
- Closing and re-opening chrome
- On incognito
